# EnumFormatter.Serialize method

Serializes an enum to an equivalent integer or string depending on the configuration

```csharp
public string Serialize(object objValue)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| objValue | Enum to serialize. |

## Return Value

Correctly serialized value based on the EnumOptions
